urlText: Central Station: Access changes due to Sydney Metro construction works
content:
There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Platforms 20, 21
Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platforms to the southern end of the platforms. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platforms and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from these platforms, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

Platforms 18, 19
Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platforms to the southern end of the platforms. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platforms and follow directions from staff.

The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed
Access to platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse during this period.

You can view a map of the station here. For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Access changes due to Sydney Metro construction works

properties.speechText: There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.
